title: Total number of retail prescriptions filled annually in the U.S. 2013 to 2025
yAxis: Number of prescriptions filled in billions
summary: Overall Number of prescriptions filled in billions has increased over the Year.
Number of prescriptions filled in billions is slightly increasing from 2021 to 2024.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2022 and 2023.
The highest Number of prescriptions filled in billions, of value 4.9 was reached at Year 2024
The lowest Number of prescriptions filled in billions, of value 4.69 was reported at Year 2021
min_summary: In general Number of prescriptions filled in billions has stayed the same over the Year.
Number of prescriptions filled in billions is slightly increasing from 2021 to 2024.
